title: Chinese data set to show gradual cooling in economy
text:
Chinese data set to show gradual cooling in economy 2:18pm EDT - 01:50 
A raft of Chinese data over coming weeks is expected to show the world’s second-biggest economy cooled slightly in March from the first two months of the year, with the main risk to the outlook now centered on an escalating Sino-U.S. trade spat. Ciara Lee reports.
